text: The Inter Workflow forwarding agent sends data to the storage server. The agent can be part of both batch and real-time workflows. In the latter case, the user has to define batch closing criteria for the data to be saved in the storage directory. This is based on UDR count, byte count, or elapsed time. This section has the following subsections: Inter Workflow Forwarding Agent in a Batch Workflow Inter Workflow Real-Time Forwarding Agent Events Inter Workflow Batch Forwarding Agent Events Inter Workflow Batch Forwarding Agent Transaction Behavior Inter Workflow Forwarding Agent in a Real-Time Workflow Inter Workflow Batch Forwarding Agent Input/Output Data and MIM Inter Workflow Real-Time Forwarding Agent Transaction Behavior Inter Workflow Real-Time Forwarding Agent Input/Output Data and MIM
title: Inter Workflow Forwarding Agent - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
